song.title: I won't let your mom go down on me
song.info:
Makke sings 80's top hit from Nik Kershaw (I won't let the sun go down on me)
Forty fools in the lobby. Your mom is a dirty whore. That is her favourite hobby, Looking at the score. She has been in all the houses With a radius for miles and miles. She has been in all the trousers Of every guy you know in town.
Good or bad, like it or not, She's the only mom you've got.
I won't let your mom go down on me. I won't let your mom go down. I won't let your mom go down on me. No, I won't let your mom go down.
Your mother's nature is on her back, Three hundred million guys per year. She has been in every sack And now she's after mine. No fear! Every man should watch their scrotum; She has vacuum inside her head. Four fingers up the bottom, She will suck till the place is red.
Maybe I won't mind if she would. I hear she sucks cock quite good, but
I won't let your mom go down on me. I won't let your mom go down. I won't let your mom go down on me. No, I won't let your mom go down.
